CONSULTANT
Executive Profile
Over 5 years experience in the marijuana industry.
Managing and assisting in building up a marijuana business to a multi million dollar, multi company operation.
Solid management experience and strong knowledge in operations of Dispensary (Retail), OPC (Grow), and MIP (Manufacturing).
